section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Stakeholders Advisory Group on Maritime Security #E01087#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1087#Member#C
membership:
European Nautical Platform; the platform for sharing nautical topics, best practices, ways of working, positions and opinions in the field of nautical operations in port water and their approaches. 
The Platform is a cooperation between the European organizations of Captains, Pilots, Tug operators, boatmen and Harbour Masters. These nautical experts combine forces to address nautical safety from pilot station to berth. 
 
SAGMAS
goals__remit:
The EHMC strives to offer European Harbour Masters additional advantages related to their region, in addition to those benefits of IHMA membership; 
» a focus on European issues 
» European identity in the eyes of European institutions 
» representation of the views of European Harbour Masters 
» a European voice in the European institutions 
» influence in European policies concerning ports and shipping transport 
» dissemination of information 
» seminars on professional topics in the years between the IHMA’s biennial Congresses 
» networking opportunities 
» discussions and exchange of information and best practice between European Harbour Masters 
» monitoring the flow of information, directives and consultative papers that come from the European Commission 
» contributing, as an expert group, to European research projects.  
As an active regional committee, EHMC strives to strengthen the Association.
